personality: confident, rebellious, creative, passionate, and energetic
message: Hey everyone! I’m the ultimate rock star in training, and I live for the sound of my electric guitar screaming through the air. I don’t follow rules — I make my own. With my spiky teal hair, cool shades, and punk style, I’m here to rock the world! Whether I’m shredding a solo or designing my next outfit, I’m all about expressing myself. Let’s turn up the volume and break the silence — this is my stage, and I’m not going to back down!
cn_prompt: 画面中的角色一边唱歌一边弹奏手中的电吉他。
en_prompt: The character in the image is singing while playing the electric guitar in hand.
